snippet.desc: When an actor with this behavior is clicked, it destroys itself.
snippet.description: When an actor with this behavior is clicked, it destroys itself.
snippet.name: Destroy Self On Click

snippet.desc: We need a way to indicate which objects can be destroyed and which ones cannot. This behavior adds a quick tween to make destroyable objects grow and shrink when the mouse is hovered on them.
snippet.description: We need a way to indicate which objects can be destroyed and which ones cannot. This behavior adds a quick tween to make destroyable objects grow and shrink when the mouse is hovered on them.
snippet.name: Grow on Mouse Over

actortype.desc: Choose the type of particles to create when this actor is clicked.
actortype.name: _Particle

number.desc: The number of particles to generate.
number.name: _NumberofParticles

snippet.desc: Modified version of Fade Out and Die for use with particles and other recycled actors.
snippet.description: Modified version of Fade Out and Die for use with particles and other recycled actors.
snippet.name: Fade Out and Recycle after Time

number.desc:
The time in seconds it takes for the actor to begin fading out.

Default: 1
number.name: _StartFadingAfter

number.desc:
The amount of time in seconds it takes the actor to fade all the way out and die.

Default: 3
number.name: _FadeTime

snippet.desc: When the happy block enters this zone, the level has been cleared.
snippet.description: When the happy block enters this zone, the level has been cleared.
snippet.name: Goal Zone

scene.desc: Next level in the game after this one is completed.
scene.name: _NextScene

snippet.desc: Make actor die upon leaving the bottom of the screen. Reload the scene.
snippet.description: Make actor die upon leaving the bottom of the screen. Reload the scene.
snippet.name: Die in Pit

number.desc: Set the amount of time the screen will fade after falling in. In and Out will be the same.
number.name: _FadeTime

number.desc:
Set this to how long you wish to wait before reloading the scene.
Useful for displaying a Spawned Actor on Death animation so it completes before the reload.
number.name: _TimeBeforeReload

snippet.desc: Allow the player to simulate even when going off screen. This prevents the player from freezing when leaving the screen.
snippet.description: Allow the player to simulate even when going off screen. This prevents the player from freezing when leaving the screen.
snippet.name: Always Simulate
